parts?

parts?

Advanced Shield Generator:
This part increases the durability of the Accu-lander 21's shields, making it more resistant to damage.
Reinforced Hull:
This part makes the Accu-lander 21's hull more durable, making it more resistant to damage.
How do I make/craft
Accu-lander 21
parts?

seo.seoTitle: White Dwarf 1000 Engine - Crafting, Best Parts & More

children.text: Is
White Dwarf 1000 Engine
any good?
The White Dwarf 1000 Engine is a good engine for players who want to travel long distances quickly and efficiently.
Where do I get
White Dwarf 1000 Engine
parts?
You can get White Dwarf 1000 Engine parts from a variety of sources, including:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell White Dwarf 1000 Engine parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell White Dwarf 1000 Engine parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
White Dwarf 1000 Engine
parts?
Here are some of the best White Dwarf 1000 Engine parts:
Advanced Fuel Pump:
This part increases the efficiency of the fuel pump in the White Dwarf 1000 Engine, making it more fuel-efficient.
Reinforced Engine Housing:
This part makes the engine housing more durable.
He3 Fuel Filter:
This part filters out impurities from the He3 fuel. This ensures that the fuel is clean and free of contaminants, which can damage the engine.
How do I make/craft
White Dwarf 1000 Engine
parts?

To craft White Dwarf 1000 Engine parts, you will need to gather the necessary materials and then go to a crafting station. Once you are at the crafting station, select the "Engine Parts" tab and then select the White Dwarf 1000 Engine part that you want to craft.

children.text: Is
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit
any good?

The DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit is a good mid-range cockpit in Starfield. It provides a good balance of performance and price, and it is a good option for players who are looking for a cockpit that is both affordable and effective.
Where do I get
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit
parts?
You can get DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit parts at a variety of locations in Starfield, including:
Starship component shops
Scrapyards
Abandoned starships
Dropped by enemies
What are the best
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit
parts?
The best DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit parts are the ones that provide the biggest boost to visibility, comfort, and advanced features. Some of the best DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit parts include:
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit Mark V
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit Mark VII
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit Mark IX
How do I make/craft
DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit
parts?
You cannot craft DS10.1 Phobos Cockpit parts in Starfield. However, you can upgrade them using the Starship Modification Station.

children.text: Is
Accu-lander 11
any good?

The Accu-lander 11 is a good shuttle for players who want a small, fast, and affordable shuttle to explore planets. It is not as powerful or durable as larger starships, but it is a good choice for players who are just starting out or who do not need a lot of cargo space.
Where do I get
Accu-lander 11
parts?
You can get Accu-lander 11 parts from a variety of sources, including:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell Accu-lander 11 parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell Accu-lander 11 parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
Accu-lander 11
parts?
Here are some of the best Accu-lander 11 parts:
Advanced Shield Generator:
This part increases the durability of the Accu-lander 11's shields, making it more resistant to damage.
Reinforced Hull:
This part makes the Accu-lander 11's hull more durable, making it more resistant to damage.
How do I make/craft
Accu-lander 11
parts?

To craft Accu-lander 11 parts, you will need to gather the necessary materials and then go to a crafting station. Once you are at the crafting station, select the "Ship Parts" tab and then select the Accu-lander 11 part that you want to craft.

seo.seoDescription: The Magellan C2 cockpit in Starfield is a sleek and modern design that is both functional and stylish.
seo.seoTitle: Magellan C2 Cockpit - Crafting, Best Parts & More

children.text: Is
Magellan C2 Cockpit
any good?

The Magellan C2 cockpit is a very good cockpit in Starfield. It is one of the most luxurious and technologically advanced cockpits in the game, and it provides pilots with everything they need to pilot a starship in style.
Where do I get
Magellan C2 Cockpit
parts?
Here are some places where you can get Magellan C2 cockpit parts:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell Magellan C2 cockpit parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell Magellan C2 cockpit parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
Magellan C2 Cockpit
parts?
Here are some of the best Magellan C2 cockpit parts:
Advanced Cockpit Control System:
This part improves the overall performance of the cockpit, making it more responsive and easier to use.
Enhanced Navigation System:
This part improves the navigation capabilities of the cockpit, making it easier to find your way around the galaxy.
Improved Sensor Suite:
This part improves the sensor capabilities of the cockpit, making it easier to detect threats and opportunities.
How do I make/craft
Magellan C2 Cockpit
parts?
Here are some steps on how to make/craft Magellan C2 Cockpit parts:
Gather the necessary materials. The materials you need will vary depending on the part you are crafting.
Go to a crafting station. Crafting stations can be found in all major cities.
Select the part you want to craft.
Follow the instructions on the crafting station.
Once the crafting process is complete, you will have a new Magellan C2 cockpit part.

Is
Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft
any good?
The Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft is a good ship part for the Pinpoint 3G Lander starship. It increases the rear landing gear assembly's durability, making it more resistant to damage.
Where do I get
Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft
parts?
You cannot purchase Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft parts in-game. You can only obtain them by completing the side quest "The Missing Parts".
What are the best
Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft
parts?
There are no "best" Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft parts. The best part for you will depend on your playstyle and the needs of your Pinpoint 3G Lander starship.
How do I make/craft
Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft
parts?
You cannot craft Pinpoint 3G Lander Aft parts.

children.text: Is
Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore
any good?

It increases the front landing gear assembly's durability, making it more resistant to damage. This is a good part to have if you are planning on landing your Pinpoint 3G Lander on rough terrain or in dangerous environments.
Where do I get
Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore
parts?
You cannot purchase Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore parts in-game. You can only obtain them by completing the side quest "The Missing Parts"
What are the best
Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore
parts?
There are no "best" Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore parts. The best part for you will depend on your playstyle and the needs of your Pinpoint 3G Lander starship.
How do I make/craft
Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore
parts?
You cannot craft Pinpoint 3G Lander Fore parts.

Is
Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1
any good?
The Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 is a good living quarters module for players who want a small, affordable option. It is not the most luxurious module, but it is functional and it will get the job done.
Where do I get
Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1
parts?
Here are some places where you can get Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 parts:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1
parts?
Here are some of the best Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 parts:
Advanced Sleeping Quarters:
This part improves the comfort of the bed in the Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1.
Updated Kitchenette:
This part adds a few new appliances to the kitchenette in the Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1.
How do I make/craft
Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1
parts?
There's no precise way of making the parts yourself just yet but you can also craft Nova Galactic Hab 1x1x1 parts yourself. This requires a high level of crafting skill and the right materials

parts?

parts?

parts?

Improved Cooling System:

Mauler 104L Cannon
parts?

children.text: Is
Titan 350 He3 Tank
any good?
The Titan 350 He3 Tank is a very good fuel tank for ships that do a lot of interstellar travel. It is expensive, but it is worth it for the increased fuel capacity and efficiency.
Where do I get
Titan 350 He3 Tank
parts?
Here are some places where you can get Titan 350 He3 Tank parts:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell Titan 350 He3 Tank parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell Titan 350 He3 Tank parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
Titan 350 He3 Tank
parts?
Here are some of the best Titan 350 He3 Tank parts:
Advanced Fuel Pump:
This part improves the efficiency of the fuel pump in the Titan 350 He3 Tank. This means that you will use less fuel when you are using the tank.
Reinforced Tank Shell:
This part makes the tank shell more durable. This means that it is less likely to be damaged in combat or during a crash.
He3 Fuel Filter:
This part filters out impurities from the He3 fuel. This ensures that the fuel is clean and free of contaminants, which can damage the tank.
How do I make/craft
Titan 350 He3 Tank
parts?
There's no precise way of making the parts yourself just yet but you can also craft Titan 350 He3 Tank parts yourself. This requires a high level of crafting skill and the right materials.

children.text: Is
NG-20 Lander - Wide
any good?
The NG-20 Lander - Wide is a good choice for players who want a larger and more capable shuttle to explore planets.
Where do I get
NG-20 Lander - Wide
parts?
You can get NG-20 Lander - Wide parts from a variety of sources, including:
Vendors:
There are a number of vendors in the game who sell NG-20 Lander - Wide parts. These vendors can be found in all major cities.
Marketplaces:
There are also a number of marketplaces where you can buy and sell NG-20 Lander - Wide parts. These marketplaces can be found online and in-game.
What are the best
NG-20 Lander - Wide
parts?
Here are some of the best NG-20 Lander - Wide parts:
Advanced Shield Generator:
This part increases the durability of the NG-20 Lander - Wide's shields, making it more resistant to damage.
Reinforced Hull:
This part makes the NG-20 Lander - Wide's hull more durable, making it more resistant to damage.
How do I make/craft
NG-20 Lander - Wide
parts?

To craft NG-20 Lander - Wide parts, you will need to gather the necessary materials and then go to a crafting station. Once you are at the crafting station, select the "Ship Parts" tab and then select the NG-20 Lander - Wide part that you want to craft.
